not-found.title: The page you are looking for does not exist

tooltips.indicatorBalance: Choose indicators that will be displayed from Balance Sheet report (Statement of financial position)
tooltips.indicatorFinance: Choose indicators that will be displayed from Profit and Losses report (Income Statement)
tooltips.seo: To search for an inaccurate name, you must begin and end the search with the "*" sign. Example:
tooltips.riskTitle:
Shows enterprises that meet specified criteria (risk-indicators).
Examples:
— show all enterprises which have assets more than 200 million UAH, and which have a positive trend in revenue
— show all enterprises which have revenue less than 500 million UAH, value of assets less than 1 billion UAH, and which have a negative EBITDA trend
